biotools.summary: ‘datmat’ is a Python package aimed to easily gather data from a variety of sources and materialize it into a standardized format. It can download projects of imaging data from XNAT into the EUCAIM folder structure, and is designed to be extendible to support other inputs and outputs.

bioschemas.name: datmat
